alert.note: Alert for McCone; Western Roosevelt (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 3:29PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Roosevelt, northeastern McCone, northwestern Dawson and northwestern Richland Counties through 430 PM MDT... At 328 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles south of Wolf Point to near Vida. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wolf Point and Vida. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
